data.sentence: The word إِلَى comes from the root ا ل ي and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: Hell or Hell-fire, name of the fire with which GOD will punish in the life to come, proper name of the abode of punishment.
data.sentence: The word جَهَنَّمَ comes from the root ج ه ن م and is associated with the meanings: Hell or Hell-fire, name of the fire with which GOD will punish in the life to come, proper name of the abode of punishment.

data.meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
data.sentence: The word نَارِ comes from the root ن و ر and is associated with the meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
